definitions.title: vb. Haph.
definitions.body: take . . . possession of (Syr. be strong, overcome; Targum be strong, take possession of; Eg. Aram. Haph. [[חחסן]] hold property S-C:D 2+, cf. BH [[חסן]]);—Pf. 3 mpl. [[הֶחֱסִ֫נ]] (K:§ 38. 3 Kmp:ad loc.) Da 7:22; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יַחְסְנוּן]] (K:§ 38. 1 b)) v:Da 7:18 (perhaps point [[סִנוּן]]-).
